title: Private Tutor to the Duke's Daughter
overview: After failing the royal court sorcerer exam, Allen finds himself stuck with no job, no money, and no way home. Just as all hope seems lost, he's offered an unexpected position: private tutor to the daughter of one of the kingdom's most influential nobles, Duke Howard. His student, Tina, is a prodigy in every academic field, except magic. With the Royal Academy's entrance exams looming and magical ability a strict requirement, Allen must uncover the mystery behind Tina's magical block. Using his unorthodox teaching methods and a deep understanding of sorcery, Allen may be her last chanceâ€¦ but is there more to this assignment than he was told?
